DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine feasibility toxicity hyperbaric oxygen combine conformal radiotherapy patient newly diagnose glioblastoma multiforme . II . Determine efficacy regimen term radiographic tumor response , time tumor progression , survival patient . OUTLINE : Within 2 week surgery , patient receive hyperbaric oxygen 90 minute daily , follow conformal radiotherapy twice daily 5 day week 17 day absence unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow within 2 week every 2 month thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 5-10 patient accrue study within 1 year .
